name: Telegram Video Merge Bot
description: A Telegram Video Merge Bot in Pyrogram by @YashOswalYO

TELEGRAM_API.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

LOGCHANNEL.description: Logs Channel ID for some Tracking XD. Example: -100123456789

USER_SESSION_STRING.description: Premium account session string to upload upto 4GB (requires `LOGCHANNEL`)
